mapper.insert: insert into board (num, id, title, contents) values (board_seq.nextval, #{id},#{title},#{contents})
mapper.select: select num , name , title , to_char(inputdate, 'yy/mm/dd') inputdate from member, board where member.id = board.id order by num desc

select num , name , title , to_char(inputdate, 'yy/mm/dd') inputdate from member, board where member.id = board.id and (upper(title) like '%' || upper(#{keyword} or upper(contents) like '%' || upper(#{keyword}) order by num desc
mapper.delete: delete from board where num = #{num} and id=#{id}
